text:
Created attachment 32318
Build output file

Hello,

I try to build with Ant an app using Cordova. But i have some weird behaviour:
The ant build finish with success but produces no output. I try to look forward and I notice that Ant build think that output repository already exist although they don't exist in my working repository:

[echo] Creating output directories if needed...
    [mkdir] Skipping C:\Users\pierre\cordova-camera\platforms\android\ant-build because it already exists.
    [mkdir] Skipping C:\Users\pierre\cordova-camera\platforms\android\ant-build\res because it already exists.

I actually use Ant 1.9.4 on Windows 8.1.

Could you help me to resolve this issue? Have anyone have an idea on this weird behaviour?

Thanks
creator: pierre_taillard@yahoo.fr
pierre_taillard@yahoo.fr
text:
I found the solution: it's about Comodo Antivirus and its virtual environment sandboxed!!! 
Sorry for this
